ValidationRule.description: PEO Future Renewal Stage Required Fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Future Renewal'), Contains($Label.OpptyRecordTypeForPEOFutureRenewalStageRequiredFields,$RecordType.DeveloperName), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.H_B_Renewal_Date__c,''), ISBLANK(Account.H_B_Carrier__c), ISPICKVAL(Account.PEO_Target_Field__c,''), ISBLANK(Follow_Up_Date__c), ISPICKVAL(Payroll_Current_Prior_Method__c,''), ISBLANK(NextStep) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields must be populated: H&B Renewal Date, H&B Carrier, PEO Target, Payroll Current-Prior Method, Follow Up Date, and Next Step
